_sText:
I making good lightbar with rotating & flash & strobe lights & custom siren sounds

Lots of different lightbars & added custom sound wail yelp hilo powercall airhorn in 'siren' folder install 'sound' folder if don't have, just create new folder 'sound'.

1 driveable with lightbar & siren sound, this driveable from youtube tutorial step by step & some added things.

Few problem all dynamic lights no options flags 'start on' & 'initially dark' when start can't turn off lights, just create 'trigger_multiple' when respawn player touch start turn off all dynamic lights.

Dynamic light & light & point spotlight used logic_timer loop flash lights.

BSP & VMF & Textures & sounds includes zip folder.

If you use this prefabs, must credit me. You can change any textures.

Video lightbar & siren
